meanings.definition: A person who works hard to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: The young striver studied diligently for his exams.
meanings.sent2: The dedicated striver never gave up on his dreams.
meanings.sent3: The ambitious striver decided to climb Mount Everest on a pogo stick.
meanings.sent4: She was a relentless striver, always reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The determined striver's perseverance paid off when he finally reached his goal.

meanings.definition: One who makes great efforts to succeed.
meanings.sent1: As a striver, she put in extra hours to excel in her career.
meanings.sent2: The ambitious striver never shied away from challenges.
meanings.sent3: The enthusiastic striver attempted to break the world record for most high-fives in a minute.
meanings.sent4: He was a true striver, constantly pushing himself to new heights.
meanings.sent5: The resilient striver's determination inspired those around him.
